role_definition: This service domain handles the operation of the PBX/telephony infrastructure which can include embedded IVR capabilities. The PBX system will have close integration with the call center and E-Branch capabilities depending on the degree of computer telephony integration (CTI) and cross channel support
example_of_use: The numeric menu is adjusted to increase self-serve activity during a period of peak loading (this could be implemented in the IVR in a more sophisticated set-up)
executive_summary: This service domain operates the telephone channel infrastructure, including the IVR and any other automated devices as appropriate. This includes handling default routing rules and intra-day/session adjustments to deal with peak load or other operational variations
key_features: Provide out bound voice connections voice
Handle service issue reporting and resolution
list_of_scenarios: Handle Failed Self Service Product Application (views/view_54810.html)
